name: DreadMoon
description:
Enter the world of DreadMoon, where primal ferocity clashes with vampiric tyranny.
Drawing inspiration from legendary titles like Quake and Halo, and enriched with modern enhancements, this first-person shooter plunges you into a relentless battle against the vampire lord Balthazar in a land stained with blood.



Starting December 12, 2023, dive into Dreadmoon's Early Access Multiplayer release free of charge.
From the depths of Luisa's mausoleum to the corridors of Balthazar's library, battle across classic modes like Capture the Flag and Team Deathmatch, embrace the hunt in Alpha mode, or experience raw, explosive action in Sticks and Stones. The game is still in Early Access, and we released the multiplayer in this state because we want people to come chat with us and engage with the community. We're a small but mighty team and are working as fast as we can to implement improvements. We want your help in developing and thoughts on how to improve the game!



From rapid-fire crossbows to deadly miniguns, a wide assortment of weapons are out there for you to satiate your bloodlust.



BloodRage: when enough blood has been shed, you can enter a state of primal fury and wreak havoc on your foes.



https://discord.gg/CG8ZUNeGMd
Join our community Discord to find your pack!



Campaign Mode - Put an end to the endless night as Ulric, a knight reborn as a werewolf, guided by Luisa, the last survivor of her kin. Unravel a past of betrayal that unleashed the vampire lord Balthazar, whose terror now overshadows the land. Take on Balthazar's legions alone, or join forces with a team of up to 8 players in cooperative play.
